sprint_goal: Establish the complete user security context, including data storage, login, and role-based access control. No user-facing features can proceed without this foundation.
Build the core system architecture, including reliable asynchronous messaging, service health checks, a basic installer, and the DICOM data model.
Implement the end-to-end DICOM ingestion pipeline, from receiving studies via C-STORE to persisting them securely in the database and file system.
Deliver the high-performance DICOM viewer, enabling users to see the clinical data that has been ingested. This sprint focuses entirely on the complex rendering pipeline.
